SEARCH

Class Edge

java.lang.Object
Tile
Edge
public class Edge extends Tile
This class deals with the edge hexagons in the game ie. the hexagons on the perimeter It deals with where the rays start and end along with drawing ray markers in the according places.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clicked()
    This method handles what happens when an edge it clicked Firstly checks which half of the hexagon we click (upper/lower half) Then checks how many adjacent hexagons (not edges) the pressed hexagon has (it will be either 2 or 1(if it is an edge in a corner)) Then sets the direction of the ray and its end status (eg if the ray got absorbed) We use this later when creating ray markers Afterwards we calculate and change the variables to get the start position and end position of where the ray marker will be placed
    void

    Method used to draw the edge hexagons.

    Draws a ray marker with the given label in a given position
    void

    Method to draw ray markers
    void
    receiveRay(Ray r)
    Receives a ray and updates the end tile accordingly.

  • Constructor Details

    • Edge

      public Edge(int x, int y, int z)
      Constructs an Edge object with specified coordinates. Sets a lot of variables to a default value
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      z - The z-coordinate.

  • Method Details

    • clicked

      public void clicked()
      This method handles what happens when an edge it clicked Firstly checks which half of the hexagon we click (upper/lower half) Then checks how many adjacent hexagons (not edges) the pressed hexagon has (it will be either 2 or 1(if it is an edge in a corner)) Then sets the direction of the ray and its end status (eg if the ray got absorbed) We use this later when creating ray markers Afterwards we calculate and change the variables to get the start position and end position of where the ray marker will be placed
      Specified by:
      clicked in class Tile

    • receiveRay

      public void receiveRay(Ray r)
      Receives a ray and updates the end tile accordingly. checks where the end tile is and its status, which is used when creating ray markers
      Specified by:
      receiveRay in class Tile
      Parameters:
      r - The incoming ray.

    • drawBottom

      public void drawBottom(Graphics2D g2, boolean showCircles)
      Method used to draw the edge hexagons.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      g2 - The graphics context.
      showCircles - Indicates whether to show circles or not.

    • drawRayMarker

      public void drawRayMarker(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws ray markers on the edge tile. Changes colour accordingly if ray got absorbed or reflected
      Specified by:
      drawRayMarker in class Tile
      Parameters:
      g2 - The graphics context.

    • drawSquare

      public void drawSquare(Graphics2D g2, Point position, int label)
      Draws a ray marker with the given label in a given position
      Parameters:
      g2 - The graphics context.
      position - The position of the square.
      label - The label for the square.
